snippet.title: ENDLESS™ Dungeon - Gameplay Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
You want more ENDLESS™ Dungeon gameplay? You've got more ENDLESS™ Dungeon gameplay! Let ZED run you through the rules of survival. We'll let you decide if you want to follow 'em!

ENDLESS™ Dungeon is a rogue-lite tactical action game, set in the award-winning Endless universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters…  or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

Follow Endless Dungeon on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EndlessUniverse
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonoftheendless
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/amplitudestudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/endlessuniverse
